document.full_text: when a bp oil rig exploded and sank in the gulf of mexico last april, killing 11 workers, authorities first reported that no crude was leaking into the ocean.
document.title: a year on, gulf still grapples with bp oil spill
lines_and_colors: when a bp oil rig exploded and sank in the gulf of mexico last april, killing 11 workers, authorities first reported that no crude was leaking into the ocean.
